welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tega Cay, a charming city known for its scenic beauty and friendly atmosphere. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. We hope you have a wonderful time here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rock Hill Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Rock Hill Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Charlotte Douglas Airport primarily serves American Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves a variety of airlines, including Delta and United.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves primarily domestic flights for a variety of airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves primarily international flights for a variety of airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse E
terminals.description: Concourse E at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves a variety of airlines, including JetBlue and Southwest.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Concord-Padgett Regional Airport houses all ticketing counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is home to gates A1-A5 and serves domestic flights operated by major airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is home to gates B1-B3 and serves international flights operated by select airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
